Interface CoffeeTruck

All Known Implementing Classes:
CoffeeTruckImp
public interface CoffeeTruck
This is the main interface for the application, representing the management of a coffee truck
.

    • Coffee

      int Coffee(String type, int numSugars, float price, boolean milk, int size, boolean heat)
      This is a method to create a coffee related product
      Parameters:
      type - - the type of coffee
      numSugars - - the desired amount of sugar spoons in the coffee
      price - - the price of the coffee
      milk - - boolean to indicate does the user want milk in their coffee or not
      size - - integer to indicate small, medium or large sized cup
      heat - - boolean to see if coffee will be hot or iced
      Returns:
      The id of the coffee created.

    • Tea

      int Tea(String type, int numSugars, float price, boolean milk, int size, String flavour)
      This is a method to create a tea related product
      Parameters:
      type - - the type of tea
      numSugars - - the desired amount of sugar spoons in the tea
      price - - the price of the tea
      milk - - boolean to indicate does the user want milk in their tea or not
      size - - integer to indicate small, medium or large sized cup(1,2,3)
      flavour - - string if a specific flavour is wanted
      Returns:
      The id of the tea created.

      int removeProduct(int customerID)
      This is a method to remove a product
      Parameters:
      customerID - - id belonging to the Customer

      Order makeOrder(int customerID, int productID)
      Parameters:
      customerID - - id belonging to the Customer
      productID - - id belonging to the product

    • loadDatabase

      boolean loadDatabase(String customerFileName, String productFileName)
      Parameters:
      customerFileName - - customers database text file
      productFileName - - products database text file

    • saveDatabase

      boolean saveDatabase(String customerFileName, String productFileName)

      customerFileName - - customers database text file
      productFileName - - products database text file
